Package com.cs408.forbes.chris.analysis.classes

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Analyzer
    Analyzer class implementing the Textual_Analysis interface, namely just a simple counter algorithm
    Basic_frequency_Analysis
    The most simple analysis this package will offer, a simple word counter looking at the the amount of words in the file for reference, and then comparing to the "wordlist.txt" a very small black list
    Multi_word_frequency_analysis  
    SentimentAnalysis  
    SWDL_Lemmatization  
    SWDLParser
    The SWDL file is related to the STELA framework, containing a list of words with the associated words along side it it follows the format : , @ All lines must end in , @ or a malformed SWDL error will be thrown Lines can also reference existing items using the ! operator e.g.
